level.heading: License required.
level.text: ยง 20-309 License required. It shall be unlawful for any person to publish or conduct any sale of the type herein defined without a license therefor and a license issued pursuant to this subchapter for a sale advertised as a "branch store discontinuance sale" shall apply only to, and the sale shall be conducted only at, the premises of the branch which is being discontinued.
